poem:
Title: "Forgotten Shadows of the Rising Sun"

Frosty Nuremberg, burning bright in tales,
Yet Tokyo's tribunal, a dimmer memory sails.
Tempus, the gallows raven, unruffled by duration,
Two years against eleven moons, mere fluctuation.
Parchment mountain risen high, a skyline of injustice,
Echoes of war crimes seep through its misty corpus.
Yet, in popular discourse, it quietly evanesces,
Unremembered, thus the pain quietly undresses.
